definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]
lit. birdsong and fragrant flowers (idiom); fig. the intoxication of a beautiful spring day
lit. the flowers in one's garden cannot match the fragrance of wild flowers (idiom)/fig. other women seem more attractive than one's own partner/the grass is always greener on the other side
pinyin: jia1 hua1 mei2 you3 ye3 hua1 xiang1

sentences.english: The campus boasts elegant environment with green plants and fragrant flowers, which is excellent for learning and living.
sentences.chinese: 校园环境幽雅，绿树成荫，鸟语花香，宜学宜居。

sentences.english: Each line, inadvertently are bathed in flowers.
sentences.chinese: 每行一处，不经意间便沐浴在了花香之中。

sentences.english: Cuba gold by fragluxe is a luxurious blend of orientals with a blend of florals.
sentences.chinese: 古巴金是一种奢侈的东方花香调。

sentences.english: Trembling as the wind blew, which told of his joy of reunion to me by the dense aroma of white lotus.
sentences.chinese: 风颤颤，用白荷酽酽的花香告诉我重逢的喜悦。

sentences.english: His latest experimental short film Twitters and Fragrance is forthcoming.
sentences.chinese: 目前实验短片《鸟语花香》正在制作中。

sentences.english: Spray Impulse all over your body for an exhilarating blend of fruits and florals that will make you go 'BLING BLING'.
sentences.chinese: 将这款令人愉快的混有果味和花香的喷雾喷在全身。

sentences.english: Scattered florals on dark grounds for a moody feeling.
sentences.chinese: 在黑暗的理由为分散花香穆迪的感觉。

sentences.english: Hung Chin-Mountain National Forest Park Maolin Xiuzhu, fine spring.
sentences.chinese: 洪庆山国家森林公园茂林修竹，鸟语花香。

sentences.english: Medium-bodied dry red wine, with nose of smoky currants, floral and mineral.
sentences.chinese: 中性酒体干红葡萄酒，富有烟熏，黑醋栗和花香气味。

sentences.english: Dramatic middle notes of dark, tempting Florals and rich Fruit Accords.
sentences.chinese: 引人注目的中调暗，诱人的花香和丰硕的果实协定。

sentences.english: With lemon and green apple fragrance and flowers along with honey.
sentences.chinese: 带柠檬及青苹果清香伴随着蜂蜜及花香。

sentences.english: The locust-tree were in bloom and the fragrance of the blossoms filled the air.
sentences.chinese: 洋槐树正开着花，空气里弥漫着芬芳的花香。

sentences.english: Take a break and smell the flowers.
In the beautiful gardens full of flowers.
sentences.chinese: 在鸟语花香的美丽花园里。

sentences.english: Pause now and then to smell a rose or watch children at play.
sentences.chinese: 停下来闻闻玫瑰的花香或者看着孩子玩耍。

definition: to penetrate deeply into the heart (idiom)/to gladden the heart/to refresh the mind
